page.title: 20CLUBS OF ALL STRETTON
page.content: The Sunday School meets weekly at the church . There are two groups, older children and younger children. There is a youth club each Friday at All Stretton village hall for children nine to fourteen years. They play games and go on swimming trips. The Yew Tree Inn has a darts and dominoes team and whist drives are held in the village hall. There is a village drama club. It produces plays and an annual pantomime and some older children take part in them. The five to fourteen year olds have performed Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. There is a playgroup for two to four year olds. There is WI for ladies and a football club for men. Some years there is a Fun Day with fancy dress, races, ducking apples and many other things.
